item.title: 台湾央行称美债 "稳健"，不担心美元的储备作用
item.description: 台湾中央银行周日表示，美国政府债务 "稳健"，仍受投资者青睐，美元作为主要国际储备货币的地位也无后顾之忧。【原文：Taiwan's central bank said on Sunday that U.S. government debt is "sound" and still favoured by investors, and there are no worries about the U.S. dollar's position as the leading international reserve currency.】

item.title: 国际航空运输协会预计 2025 年可持续航空燃料产量将翻一番
item.description: 国际航空运输协会周日表示，预计到 2025 年，可持续航空燃料的生产量将翻一番，达到 200 万吨，占航空公司燃料消耗量的 0.7%。【原文：The International Air Transport Association said on Sunday it expects the amount of sustainable aviation fuel produced to double in 2025 to reach 2 million tonnes, representing 0.7% of airlines' fuel consumption.】

item.title: 研究发现，使用阿斯利康药片进行血液检测指导治疗可降低乳腺癌恶化风险
item.description: 癌症专家周日表示，在乳腺癌患者出现对标准疗法耐药的第一个迹象时，就用阿斯利康公司的实验性药片卡米雌酯（camizestrant）进行治疗，可将疾病进展或死亡的风险降低一半，这一发现可能会改变此类癌症的治疗方式。【原文：Treating breast cancer patients with AstraZeneca's experimental pill camizestrant at the first sign of resistance to standard treatments cut the risk of disease progression or death by half, a finding that could change the way such cancers are treated, cancer experts said on Sunday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，印度航空公司正在洽谈新窄体喷气机大订单
item.description: 行业消息人士称，塔塔集团旗下的印度航空公司正在与空中客车公司和波音公司洽谈新的大订单，可能包括增加约200架单通道飞机，以补充2023年的巨额订单，因为这家国旗航空公司正试图先发制人，解决日益严重的喷气式飞机短缺问题。【原文：Tata Group's Air India is in talks with Airbus and Boeing for a major new order potentially including some 200 extra single-aisle planes, topping up a mammoth 2023 deal as the flag carrier seeks to pre-empt a growing jet shortage, industry sources said.】

item.title: IndiGo 与法航-荷航、维珍航空和达美航空达成协议，扩大航线网络
item.description: 印度最大的航空公司 IndiGo 周日宣布与法荷航、维珍航空和达美航空达成协议，将其长途航线扩展至北美、欧洲和英国。【原文：India's largest airline IndiGo on Sunday announced an agreement with Air France-KLM , Virgin Atlantic and Delta to expand its long-haul services to North America, Europe and Britain, the airlines said on Sunday.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空老板抨击飞机制造商对供应链困境 "手忙脚乱"
item.description: 世界上最大的国际航空公司--迪拜的阿联酋航空公司（Emirates）负责人周日对长期存在的航空航天供应问题表示失望，并要求飞机制造商为供应商的延迟交货承担责任。【原文：The head of the world's largest international airline, Dubai's Emirates, voiced frustration on Sunday over chronic aerospace supply problems, challenging planemakers to take responsibility for late suppliers.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称，日本首相石破茂考虑在 G7 前与特朗普举行贸易会议
item.description: 据《读卖新闻》周日报道，日本首相石破茂正考虑在本月中旬的七国集团峰会之前访问华盛顿，与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普会面，以寻求达成贸易协议。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba is considering visiting Washington to meet President Donald Trump before a mid-month summit of the Group of Seven nations as he seeks a trade deal, the Yomiuri newspaper reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国和中国对韩国出口征收关税，导致韩国出口下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大范围征收关税引发的全球贸易冲突，韩国对美国和中国的出口下降，导致 5 月份韩国出口出现四个月来的首次下降。【原文：South Korea's exports fell in May for the first time in four months, as shipments to the United States and China dropped on global trade conflict triggered by U.S. President Donald Trump'ssweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 谷歌称将对在线搜索反垄断裁决提起上诉
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周六表示，将对一项反垄断裁决提起上诉，根据该裁决，联邦法官提出的恢复在线搜索竞争的方法不如反垄断执法人员建议的 10 年制度那么激进。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Saturday said it will appeal an antitrust decision under which a federal judge proposed less aggressive ways to restore online search competition than the 10-year regime suggested by antitrust enforcers】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称福特在美国召回超过 29,000 辆汽车
item.description: 国家公路交通安全管理局表示，控制臂脱落会导致车辆转向和控制失灵。【原文：A detached control arm can cause a loss of vehicle steering and control the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said.】

item.title: 吉利德公司的 Trodelvy 与 Keytruda 一起在试验中将乳腺癌风险降低了 35
item.description: 上周六公布的一项大型试验结果显示，吉利德科学公司（Gilead Sciences）的Trodelvy与默克公司（Merck）的大片免疫疗法Keytruda联合使用，可将一种侵袭性乳腺癌作为初始治疗手段的恶化风险降低35%。【原文：Gilead Sciences' Trodelvy in combination with Merck's blockbuster immunotherapy Keytruda lowered the risk of an aggressive type of breast cancer worsening by 35% when used as an initial treatment, according to results of a large trial presented on Saturday.】

item.title: 欧盟委员会对美国宣布提高钢铁关税表示 "强烈 "遗憾
item.description: 欧盟委员会周六表示，它对美国宣布提高钢铁进口关税 "强烈 "感到遗憾，欧盟准备采取反制措施。【原文：The European Commission said on Saturday that it "strongly" regrets an announced increase of U.S. tariffs on steel imports and that the EU is prepared to impose countermeasures.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普发出关税威胁，罗马的 "台伯河畔好莱坞 "仍计划卷土重来
item.description: 欧洲最大的电影制片厂 Cinecitta 正致力于将意大利重新打造成一个电影强国，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的对外国制片征收关税的建议给全球电影业蒙上了一层阴影。【原文：Europe's largest film studio Cinecitta is aiming to re-launch Italy as a movie powerhouse, even as U.S. President Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on foreign productions cast a shadow over the film industry globally.】

item.title: 中国对荷兰工业的间谍活动 "愈演愈烈"：荷兰国防部长
item.description: 荷兰国防部长鲁本-布雷克曼斯（Ruben Brekelmans）周六表示，中国正在加强对荷兰的间谍活动，重点是半导体。【原文：Chinese efforts to spy on the Dutch are intensifying, with the focus on semiconductors, Dutch Defence Minister Ruben Brekelmans said on Saturday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，欧佩克+将讨论 7 月石油产量增幅，可能超过 41.1 万桶/日
item.description: 熟悉欧佩克+谈判的消息人士告诉路透社，欧佩克+将于周六举行会议，讨论7月份的石油增产问题，增产幅度可能超过5月和6月的41.1万桶/日。【原文：OPEC+ meets on Saturday to discuss an increase in oil output for July that may be larger than the 411,000 barrels per day (bpd) increases it made for May and June, sources familiar with OPEC+ talks told Reuters.】

item.title: 特朗普称巴基斯坦代表下周将赴美参加贸易谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五表示，巴基斯坦代表将于下周访问美国，因为这个南亚国家正在寻求就关税问题达成协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday representatives from Pakistan are coming to the United States next week as the South Asian country seeks to make a deal on tariffs.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会提出保持预算持平、降低人员编制的计划
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周五表示，要求国会维持明年的预算不变，并在近期大幅裁员后大幅精简人员。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Friday said it was asking Congress to keep its budget unchanged next year and its workforce significantly leaner following recent deep staff cuts.】

item.title: 福克斯商业》报道：美联储主席戴利：4 月份 PCE 通胀 "令人欣慰"，但并不全面
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周五表示，通胀降温为饱受高物价之苦的美国人提供了 "解脱"，但未来存在通胀走高的风险。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank President Mary Daly said on Friday cooling inflation offers "relief" for Americans suffering from high prices, but that there are risks of higher inflation ahead.】

item.title: 禁止仿制减肥药，Hims 将裁员 4
item.description: 远程医疗平台 Hims & Hers 周五表示，由于美国禁止大量生产减肥药 Wegovy，该公司将裁员 68 人，约占员工总数的 4%。【原文：Telehealth platform Hims & Hers said on Friday it will cut 68 employees, or about 4% of its workforce, as it adjusts to a U.S. ban on manufacturing mass copies of the weight-loss drug Wegovy.】

item.title: 特朗普称计划将钢铁关税提高一倍至 50
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他计划将外国进口钢铁的关税从25%提高到50%，从而加大对全球钢铁生产商的压力，并誓言要深化贸易战。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said he planned to increase tariffs on foreign imports of steel from 25% to 50%, ratcheting up pressure on global steel producers and vowing to deepen his trade war.】

item.title: 从 TACO 到 FAFO，投资者喜欢模仿特朗普的缩写词
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的第二个任期已经开始四个月了，市场观察家们从他喜欢把口号浓缩成 MAGA、DOGE 和 MAHA 等朗朗上口的缩写词中得到启发，设计出了一些自己的缩写词，并在交易台上传播开来。【原文：Four months into President Donald Trump's second term, market observers have taken a cue from his fondness for condensing slogans into catchy acronyms like MAGA, DOGE and MAHA, and devised a few of their own that have been spreading across trading desks.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，巴斯夫开始出售涂料业务，估值约 68 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，德国化学品制造商巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）最近几周向潜在的收购者发出了出售其涂料业务的信息，估值约为60亿欧元（68.1亿美元）。【原文：German chemicals maker BASF SE has in recent weeks sent out information to potential suitors for a sale of its coatings business at a valuation of about 6 billion euros ($6.81 billion), Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 交易日：市场重新 "分级
item.description: - 交易日【原文：- TRADING DAY】

item.title: 特朗普称特斯拉等汽车制造商必须在美国生产汽车和零部件
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，包括特斯拉在内的美国汽车制造商必须在美国制造包括所有零部件在内的整车，而不是在国外制造零部件。【原文：Automakers in the United States, including Tesla , must build entire vehicles including all their parts in the country instead of manufacturing parts abroad, President Donald Trump said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道：Anthropic 因企业对人工智能的需求，年收入达到 30 亿美元
item.description: 据两位熟知内情的消息人士透露，人工智能开发商 Anthropic 的年收入约为 30 亿美元，这是在商业领域使用生成式人工智能的早期验证。【原文：Artificial intelligence developer Anthropic is making about $3 billion in annualized revenue, according to two sources familiar with the matter, in an early validation of generative AI use in the business world.】

item.title: 独家报道：汽车制造商警告：中国磁铁挤压威胁汽车生产
item.description: 从挡风玻璃雨刷电机到防抱死制动传感器，美国汽车业高管们对即将出现的来自中国的稀土磁铁短缺敲响了警钟。【原文：U.S. auto executives are sounding the alarm on an impending shortage of rare-earth magnets from China – used in everything from windshield-wiper motors to anti-lock braking sensors – that could force the closure of car factories within weeks.】

item.title: 据 Semafor 报道，加州对派拉蒙公司是否违反州贿赂和竞争法展开调查
item.description: 据 Semafor 周五报道，加利福尼亚州参议院已开始调查派拉蒙公司是否违反了禁止贿赂和不公平竞争的州法律。【原文：The California State Senate has opened an inquiry into whether Paramount violated state laws against bribery and unfair competition, Semafor reported on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普希望在预算法案中加大减税力度
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，他希望看到美国众议院通过的预算法案中能有更大力度的减税措施。【原文：President Donald Trump said he wants to see bigger tax cuts in the budget bill passed by the U.S. House of Representatives.】

item.title: Skechers 股东起诉鞋类制造商，要求提供 94 亿美元 3G 收购案的详情
item.description: Skechers 美国公司的一名股东起诉了这家鞋类制造商，要求其提供有关私募股权公司 3G Capital 以 94 亿美元收购该公司的更多细节，称 Skechers 创始人兼控股股东的出售决定引发了 "警示"。【原文：A Skechers USA shareholder has sued the footwear maker for more details about its $9.4 billion buyout by private equity firm 3G Capital, saying the decision by Skechers' founder and controlling shareholder to sell raises "red flags."】

item.title: 切尼尔能源公司证实萨宾帕斯液化天然气工厂开始维护工作
item.description: 切尼尔能源公司表示，美国最大的液化天然气工厂 Sabine Pass 的年度维护工作已经开始。【原文：Annual maintenance work on the largest U.S. LNG plant, Sabine Pass, has begun, Cheniere Energy said.】
